title: From Cantona to Bamford - a history of Premier League hat-tricks
description: BBC Sport takes a look back through the hat-tricks of the last 28-and-a-bit seasons of the Premier League.

title: Paul Harvey: Single gives 'new lease of life' to composer with dementia
description: The BBC Philharmonic orchestra records Paul Harvey's song after a clip of his piano playing went viral.

title: World Series 2020: Tampa Bay Rays beat LA Dodgers in extraordinary finale to game four
description: Watch the extraordinary finale to game four of the World Series as a comedy of errors from the Los Angeles Dodgers hands the Tampa Bay Rays an unlikely victory.

title: School meals: Cabinet minister defends refusal to extend holiday scheme
description: Giving money to councils is the "right way" to support families in need, a cabinet minister says.

title: Covid: Wales' lockdown supermarket rules to be 'clarified'
description: However ministers are accused of "mixed messages" over the ban on sales of "non-essential" items.

title: Post-Brexit trade talks extended, says No 10
description: No 10 confirms the EU's Michel Barnier will stay in London, rather than returning to Brussels later.

title: Swimming with sharks at Bondi Beach
description: Two Grey Nurse sharks were feeding on a large school of salmon while swimmers had a morning dip.

title: Wales national lockdown in new year 'likely', says minister
description: The current 17-lockdown could be followed by another in January of February, minister Lee Waters says.

title: England women cancel Germany friendly after positive test
description: England women's friendly with Germany on Tuesday is cancelled after a member of the team's backroom staff tests positive for coronavirus.

title: Covid: 'Staggered return' for students' Christmas break
description: The use of testing, plus staggering departures and the return to campus will form a strategy to get students home for Christmas.

title: 'Nurmagomedov has strong claim to be MMA's greatest of all time'
description: Retiring UFC lightweight champion Khabib Nurmagomedov is touted as one the greatest MMA fighters of all-time - BBC Sport looks at the evidence.

title: Misty Copeland: Ballet’s listening after George Floyd
description: Radio 1 Newsbeat hears from dancers about how the Black Lives Matter movement has changed ballet.

title: 'Murder hornet': First nest found in US eradicated with vacuum hose
description: The Asian giant hornets can wipe out a colony of honeybees in hours.

title: Coronavirus: 14-day quarantine for Covid contacts could be reduced
description: It comes as a senior Conservative MP criticises leaders of NHS Test and Trace, urging "decisive" change.

title: US election 2020: Trump in three-state campaign blitz after casting vote
description: The US president's frenetic schedule saw him visiting three key states in one day after voting in Florida.

title: Nuclear weapons treaty: Campaigners hail new era for nuclear disarmament
description: A 50th nation ratifies a key UN treaty and it will come into force - but five major powers are missing.

title: Joan Hocquard: Oldest person in Britain dies aged 112
description: Joan Hocquard, who drove ambulances during World War Two, died at her home on Saturday.

title: Europe's streets empty... again
description: With infections rising across Europe, tighter Covid restrictions are being enforced.

title: Climate change: Technology no silver bullet, experts tell PM
description: Boris Johnson's techno-optimism ignores the need for big societal changes, experts warn.

title: From civil rights to Smethwick: Why was Malcolm X in the West Midlands?
description: Why was the civil rights activist in a small industrial town in the Midlands?

title: Adele sings and jokes about weight loss as she hosts Saturday Night Live
description: The star also tells the audience "my album's not finished" as she presents the US sketch show.

title: The Papers: 'Medics angry over meals' and 'elderly paid price'
description: Sunday's papers carry reports on the ongoing free school meals controversy and quarantine changes.
